statements: SELECT * FROM VitalSigns WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT patient_id, heart_rate FROM VitalSigns WHERE temperature > 98.6;
SELECT patient_id, temperature, respiratory_rate FROM VitalSigns ORDER BY temperature DESC;
SELECT * FROM VitalSigns WHERE respiratory_rate < 15 AND blood_pressure LIKE '120%';
SELECT patient_id, blood_pressure FROM VitalSigns WHERE heart_rate BETWEEN 60 AND 100;
SELECT * FROM VitalSigns;
SELECT patient_id, heart_rate FROM VitalSigns WHERE temperature > 98.6;
SELECT patient_id, temperature, heart_rate FROM VitalSigns WHERE respiratory_rate < 20 ORDER BY temperature DESC;
SELECT patient_id, blood_pressure FROM VitalSigns WHERE blood_pressure LIKE '%120/%80%';
SELECT patient_id, respiratory_rate FROM VitalSigns WHERE respiratory_rate BETWEEN 12 AND 20 ORDER BY respiratory_rate ASC, patient_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM vital_signs;
SELECT patient_id, heart_rate, temperature FROM vital_signs;
SELECT blood_pressure FROM vital_signs WHERE temperature > 98.6;
SELECT device_name, location FROM device_info;
SELECT location, device_name, last_updated FROM device_info WHERE device_id = 1;
SELECT patient_id, heart_rate, blood_pressure, temperature FROM vital_signs WHERE temperature > 100 ORDER BY patient_id DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT patient_id, heart_rate, blood_pressure FROM vital_signs WHERE heart_rate BETWEEN 60 AND 80 ORDER BY patient_id ASC
SELECT * FROM vital_signs WHERE heart_rate < 70 AND blood_pressure LIKE '120%' ORDER BY heart_rate, blood_pressure
SELECT device_id, device_name, location FROM device_info WHERE location LIKE '%room%' ORDER BY device_name LIMIT 10
SELECT device_id, location, last_updated FROM device_info WHERE last_updated > '2022-01-01' AND location NOT LIKE '%floor%' ORDER BY last_updated DESC
SELECT * FROM patient_data;
SELECT patient_id, temperature FROM patient_data WHERE temperature > 98.6;
SELECT patient_id, heart_rate FROM patient_data ORDER BY heart_rate DESC;
SELECT device_name, location FROM device WHERE location = 'ICU';
SELECT alert_id, alert_description, timestamp FROM alert ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM patient_data WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT patient_id, temperature, heart_rate FROM patient_data WHERE temperature > 98.6 AND heart_rate > 80;
SELECT device_id, device_name, location FROM device ORDER BY location ASC;
SELECT a.patient_id, a.alert_description, a.timestamp, p.temperature, p.heart_rate FROM alert a JOIN patient_data p ON a.patient_id = p.patient_id;
SELECT MAX(temperature) AS max_temp, MIN(temperature) AS min_temp FROM patient_data;
SELECT * FROM vital_signs ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT patient_id, temperature, heart_rate FROM vital_signs WHERE temperature > 37;
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE age > 50 ORDER BY age;
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM patients WHERE gender = 'Female' AND medical_history IS NOT NULL;
SELECT device_id, temperature, heart_rate FROM device_data WHERE status = 'Active';
SELECT * FROM vital_signs;
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM patients WHERE age > 30;
SELECT device_id, location, status FROM devices WHERE status = 'active';
SELECT patient_name, temperature, heart_rate FROM patients JOIN vital_signs ON patients.id = vital_signs.patient_id;
SELECT device_id, temperature, heart_rate FROM devices JOIN device_data ON devices.device_id = device_data.device_id WHERE temperature > 37.5;
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT name, age, gender FROM patients WHERE age > 30;
SELECT location_name, latitude, longitude FROM locations ORDER BY location_name DESC;
SELECT device_id, device_type, status FROM devices WHERE status = 'active';
SELECT heart_rate, blood_pressure, temperature FROM vital_signs WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM vital_signs WHERE temperature > 100 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;

SELECT patients.name, vital_signs.heart_rate, devices.device_type FROM patients JOIN vital_signs ON patients.id = vital_signs.patient_id JOIN devices ON devices.patient_id = patients.id WHERE patients.age > 50;
SELECT alert_message, timestamp FROM alerts WHERE patient_id = 3;
SELECT location_name, latitude, longitude FROM locations WHERE location_name LIKE 'ICU%';

SELECT patients.name, patients.age, vital_signs.heart_rate, vital_signs.blood_pressure, devices.device_type FROM patients JOIN vital_signs ON patients.id = vital_signs.patient_id JOIN devices ON devices.patient_id = patients.id ORDER BY patients.age DESC;
